name: EnMS Energy Management Skill
author: A Plus Engineering
description: Human-centric voice assistant for industrial energy management (ISO 50001). Provides real-time monitoring, anomaly detection, forecasting, and decision support for manufacturing SMEs. Part of WASABI H2020 HumanEnerDIA project.
examples: What's the power consumption of Compressor-1?
How much energy did Boiler-1 use yesterday?
